text: Soni chisimu naga tuli tumpele kupasya ukoto wakuuma Kukwetu panyuma pa masausyo gagankwayiye, chisimu akasawechetaga kuti: “Ayi niyangune (ni jwaanguwajilwa kupata yeleyi ligongo lyaumanyilisi wangu), soni nganguganichisya yanti Kiyama kuwa nkwiima. Nambo naga timbuchisyidwe kwa Ambuje wangu, nikuti chisimu une tinjipata yambone Kukwakwe.” Basi tuchatagulila kwene awala waakufuulu yawapanganyisye, ni chitukape kupasya kwene mu ilagasyo yakandapala
